data.job_description:
Noatum, part of AD Ports Group, is a leading multinational company in maritime, logistics, and port services, recognized for its more than 50 years of activity, service excellence, and specialized staff.

Our activity is divided into three main business areas: Noatum Maritime Services, focused on providing maritime services; Noatum Logistics, a comprehensive logistics operator; and Noatum Terminals, the port operations division. The cross-functional nature of these three areas allows us to offer integrated solutions with a high degree of specialization and innovation.

Currently, Noatum is recognized for the excellence of its service and its specialized and trustworthy team of more than 4,500 professionals, who, through their dedication and commitment, contribute every day to making Noatum one of the most renowned companies in its sector. We strive to ensure that all our activities reflect responsibility and commitment to quality, people, and the environment.

At Noatum Holdings, we encourage you to join our project! Are you ready to take on a new professional challenge as a HR Data Analyst within the HR team? Let us tell you more!

As an HR Data Analyst, you will play a key role in ensuring the functionality and evolution of our HR systems. You will work with our current platform (Cegid) and contribute to strategic projects that will shape the future of our HR operations. The position can be based in our Barcelona office (Torre Auditori) or in Madrid (Coslada).

Main Responsibilities
‚Ä¢ Ensure the proper functioning and usability of our HRIS.
‚Ä¢ Act as first-level support for HRIS-related incidents and requests.
‚Ä¢ Drive continuous improvement and prepare for future technological evolutions.
‚Ä¢ Document processes and create user guides.
‚Ä¢ Collaborate on integrations with global tools (LMS, recruitment portals, etc.).
‚Ä¢ Work closely with local and global teams to ensure process and system alignment.

We Offer
‚Ä¢ Permanent position.
‚Ä¢ Flexible working hours for start and finish times.
‚Ä¢ Afternoon off on your birthday.
‚Ä¢ Ticket Restaurant.
‚Ä¢ Continuous training through our corporate university.
‚Ä¢ An excellent work environment where you can develop in a highly dynamic sector operating globally.
‚Ä¢ Joining a company in full expansion.

At Noatum Holdings, we guarantee equality and non-discrimination based on gender, race, religion, disability, age, and sexual orientation in our selection processes, to make the most of people‚Äôs capabilities in all their diversity, avoiding any type of discrimination.

Minimum Requirements
‚Ä¢ A university degree that is aligned with the requirements of the position.
‚Ä¢ Minimum of 3 years of experience in a same role.
‚Ä¢ Knowledge of HR data management and processes.
‚Ä¢ High level of English and Spanish.
‚Ä¢ Strong analytical skills and attention to detail.
‚Ä¢ Proactivity and ability to work in global environments.
‚Ä¢ Effective communication and teamwork.
‚Ä¢ Results-oriented and committed to continuous improvement.

#Noatum

Descripci√≥n

Desde **KENOS Technology** queremos que t√∫ seas el principal actor en tu carrera profesional, para ello ofrecemos proyectos donde t√∫ ser√°s el principal valor, ser√°s el centro del proyecto y dispondr√°s de formaci√≥n real orientada a tus expectativas profesionales.

Estamos contratando a un/a **Data Analyst ETL** para un proyecto 100% remoto (desde Espa√±a).
‚Ä¢ *Responsabilidades**:

- Desarrollar y gestionar **procesos ETL utilizando BDM, IDQ o Power Center.**:

- Realizar consultas y optimizaci√≥n en SQL.
- Utilizar Inform√°tica AXON y EDC a n√≠vel usuario.
- Ejecutar consultas en HIVE/Cloudera.
- Manejar comandos b√°sicos en bash/shell.
- Trabajar de manera proactiva y aut√≥noma.
- Colaborar en un entorno full remoto, manteniendo una comunicaci√≥n efectiva con el equipo.
‚Ä¢ *Requisitos**:

- Aportar m√≠nimo 3 a√±os de experi√™ncia profesional en el mismo rol.
- Experi√™ncia avanzada en al menos una de las siguientes herramientas: Informatica **BDM, IDQ, Power Center.**:

- Dominio avanzado de **SQL.**:

- Conocimientos a n√≠vel usuario de Informatica AXON y EDC.

- Proactividad y autonom√≠a (indispensable).

- Salario: 30K-35K

Si te identificas **no dudes en aplicar,** estamos deseando conocerte

This year marks 10 years since we launched the idea that simplifying our customers' lives is possible by offering an innovative solution that allows them to easily subscribe to, manage, and switch all types of contracts through a unique and intuitive platform.

In that time, we have supported more than 2 millions customers in France, Spain, and Italy, while investing in new verticals and positioning ourselves as a highly efficient, innovative, and competitive scale-up in a rapidly growing market.

With over 900 employees across 3 locations, we are solidifying our position as a market leader in Europe. We are always on the lookout for talent ready to join a dedicated and motivated team driven by a meaningful project. Working with us means embracing a culture of excellence, innovation, and real impact.

As a Data Analyst, you will join the Data Marketing Analytics team. You will act as a strategic partner to the Strategic Partnerships department (B2B2C), helping them optimize performance and decision-making regarding the acquisition and retention of our partners (Banks and Real Estate Agencies).
Key Responsibilities :
‚Ä¢ Predictive Modeling: Develop sophisticated models to evaluate and anticipate partner trends and agency behaviors.
‚Ä¢ Performance Steering: Support Partnership Managers in tracking and driving their teams' performance through data.
‚Ä¢ Customer Journey Analysis: Explore data from customer pathways to refine marketing strategies, boost commercial performance, and enhance the overall customer experience.
‚Ä¢ Data Pipeline Management: Contribute to the maintenance and scalability of the data pipeline, ensuring data is collected, cleaned, structured, and accessible.
‚Ä¢ Data Visualization: Design intuitive, operational dashboards to provide teams with daily insights and facilitate informed decision-making.

About you :
‚Ä¢ Education: You come from a Business or Engineering school background.
‚Ä¢ Technical Skills: You are proficient in SQL and comfortable with analytical reasoning. (Knowledge of Python or visualization tools like Looker is a plus).
‚Ä¢ Soft Skills: You are a creative problem-solver, autonomous, and resourceful. You learn quickly and adapt easily to new topics.
‚Ä¢ Collaboration: You have excellent communication skills and know how to interact with diverse teams (Sales, Ops, Marketing).
‚Ä¢ Mindset: You have an entrepreneurial spirit‚Äîalways looking for optimizations, new opportunities, and things to test.
‚Ä¢ Experience: Previous experience in the digital sector is a plus.

What we offer :

Thrive in an international and inclusive environment: everyone has a place at papernest. With over 46 different nationalities, it‚Äôs not uncommon here to start a sentence in English and finish it en fran√ßais or en espa√±ol ¬°

üí∏ Compensation: a plan for Subscription Warrants for Company Creators (BSPCE) in accordance with company regulations, as well as a Pluxee card to manage your tax level through a voluntary compensation system across different services (transportation, dining, and childcare).

üèÜ Benefits: as a home insurance provider and a supplier of green electricity and gas, we offer attractive deals to our employees. After all, there‚Äôs no reason why things should only be simpler for our customers!

ü©∫ Health: medical insurance through Alan or Sanitas to manage your healthcare expenses in an ultra-simple, paperless way, with up to 50% coverage by papernest (after 6 months in the company).

üçΩÔ∏è Meals & partnerships: a healthy breakfast offered every Tuesday, as well as partnerships with various services in Barcelona (restaurants, sports, leisure, and care centers).

üìö Training: the development of our employees is essential. You will have access to ongoing training tailored to your goals, whether it involves technical, language, or managerial skills.

üìà Career Development: numerous opportunities are available for you to grow, whether by deepening your expertise or exploring new paths. We support you in your professional ambitions.

‚ú® Remote Work: enjoy 2 days of remote work per week to optimize your focus and efficiency.

Hiring process:
‚Ä¢ First interview with Juliette (Talent Acquisition Partner)
‚Ä¢ Technical SQL Test
‚Ä¢ Interview with L√©a (Data Analyst Lead)
‚Ä¢ Interview with Hern√°n (Data Analytics Manager)

Interested in this challenge? üôÇ

Don‚Äôt hesitate any longer‚Äîwe look forward to meeting you! Regardless of your age, gender, background, religion, sexual orientation, or disability, there‚Äôs a place for you with us. Our selection processes are designed to be inclusive, and our work environment is adapted to everyone‚Äôs needs.

We particularly encourage applications from women. Even if you feel that you don‚Äôt meet all the criteria outlined in this job posting, please know that every application is valuable. We strongly believe that diverse and varied backgrounds enrich our team, and we will carefully consider your application. Parity and diversity are essential assets to our success.

data.job_title: Senior Web Analyst/ Digital Analyst- Full Time
data.job_description:
Job Description:
We are looking for a seasoned Web Analyst with deep expertise in Adobe Analytics to lead our analytics practice and mentor junior analysts. This role bridges business needs with technical solutions, ensuring scalable, agile reporting and actionable insights.

Responsibilities:

Lead and guide junior analysts, fostering best practices and continuous learning.
Translate complex business requirements into analytics solutions, choosing the best tools form the full toolkit.
Drive transformation of current systems into scalable, agile reporting frameworks, apply industry best practices.
Engage stakeholders to deliver insights that inform strategic decisions.
Requirements (Must-Have):

Extensive experience with Adobe Analytics implementation and reporting.
Strong leadership and stakeholder management skills.
Ability to manage projects independently with high-level direction.
Preferred (Nice-to-Have):

Experience with Google Analytics reporting and experimentation tools (e.g., A/B testing platforms).
Familiarity with multi-tool ecosystems for holistic business insights.
5+ years of hands-on experience in large-scale enterprise environments, capable of navigating complex setups and delivering robust analytics solutions.

data.job_description:
A sustainability ratings provider in Barcelona is looking for an experienced Senior Product Analyst to join their Product Analytics team.
